ValidationRule.description: Makes the Closed Reason field mandatory if request is Closed or Rejected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Closed"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Rejected") ) && OR(ISBLANK(TEXT(Closed_Reason__c)),ISBLANK(TEXT(Outcome_Category__c))), AND( RecordType.Name != 'Bug', RecordType.Name != 'Improvement', RecordType.Name != 'Knowledge'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please choose a reason and outcome for ticket closure or rejection
